select album_m_seq.nextval from dual
insert into album_m (abno, name, detail, price, singer, image, pbno) values (#{abno},#{name},#{detail},#{price},#{singer},#{image},#{pbno})
mapper.select: select /*+ index_desc(album_m album_m_pk) */ * from album_m where abno > 0
select * from newly where rownum < 15 order by tbno desc
select * from album_single where tname like '%'||#{tname}||'%'
select a.pbno, a.name, a.singer,a.image_240, abno, count(likes) likes from album_m a, like_m l where l.pbno = a.pbno group by a.pbno, a.name, a.singer,a.image_240, abno order by likes desc
select LPAD ((TRUNC (sum(duration) / 60)), 2, '0') || ':' || LPAD ((MOD (sum(duration), 60)), 2, '0') as totallength from track_m t where abno = #{abno}

rownum <= #{amount} * #{pageNum} order by regdate desc ) where rn > #{amount} * (#{pageNum}-1)
